results.content: Some of the content was dated but I found updated versions of different plugins. Overall, this course was VERY HELPFUL to understand how to setup and start using Buddy Press!  Thank you very much!
results.content_html: Some of the content was dated but I found updated versions of different plugins. Overall, this course was VERY HELPFUL to understand how to setup and start using Buddy Press! Thank you very much!

results.content: Great introduction to Buddy Press.  Thank you, definitely answered some of those lingering questions I had.  Gave me some direction on how to manage Buddy Press.
results.content_html: Great introduction to Buddy Press. Thank you, definitely answered some of those lingering questions I had. Gave me some direction on how to manage Buddy Press.

results.content: This is a good overview and explanation of the individual features and setup of BuddyPress but it's somewhat dated. It could also use some written notes on the themes, plugins and websites mentioned, would save pausing the video to jot them down.
results.content_html: This is a good overview and explanation of the individual features and setup of BuddyPress but it's somewhat dated. It could also use some written notes on the themes, plugins and websites mentioned, would save pausing the video to jot them down.

results.content: Very good for anybody who doesn't know what exactly buddypress is and want to understand before implementing this product. Thanks Zachary.
results.content_html: Very good for anybody who doesn't know what exactly buddypress is and want to understand before implementing this product. Thanks Zachary.

results.content: The course is good for users just started with wordpress and buddypress. Explanations are clear and well understandable but videos show 2014 wordpress installations that make the course a bit outdated. Section 4 was the more interesting to me, I was hoping for something more advanced. Zach is a good teacher and speaks a very clear English.

results.content: Basic overview of BP, need more customization specifics

results.content: So far a great beginning to BuddyPress
